title: Opinion: Proposed HHS rule on gender-affirming care radically expands use of Medicare, Medicaid as policy weapons
description: If this rule is enacted, “any kind of care could be subject to similar treatment,” experts write.
content: If this rule is enacted, “any kind of care could be subject to similar treatment,” experts write.
